categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Green Company was a company within the 41st Elite Corps of the Grand Army of the Republic. When the 41st Elite Corps was tasked with transporting the Viceroy of the Trade Federation Nute Gunray to the Venator-class Star Destroyer Tranquility, Green Company was tasked with repelling the Separatist Alliance forces that had attacked the Tranquility in an effort to either rescue Gunray or silence him.
